Summary: Silver object with light in front but made no sound
trends: There have been no other sightings in Madison
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were out walking the dog down the street and my friend and I noticed the brightness of the light. But it made no sound. It was moving in a straight line across in front of us. There was a silver disc shaped object behind the light. We do have helicopters and airplanes that fly by often but this object made no sound.
